title: Welcome to Scuba SEAsons!
content:
Created out of the desire for every dive to hold the opportunity to have an unforgettable encounter with a sea creature.

Divers everywhere make this happen by adding their own dive site and sea creature sighting contributions.

The result:
 The creation of a map of the optimum season to dive with any sea creature anywhere in the world!

I’m Emilio and I’m here to walk you through this short onboarding.

title: Your Diver Name
content:
Scuba SEAsons relies on user contributions of dive sites and sea creature sightings.

To credit and to let others know about your contributions please provide us with your “diver name”

title: Location Tracking
content:
Scuba SEAsons uses location tracking for two features within the app:

First, to allow the map to centre on your current location when needed
&
To allow you to use your current location as the GPS location of a dive site when you are physically at the dive site and you want to add it to the app.

title: Photo Gallery Access
content:
In order to make a sea creature sighting contribution to Scuba SEAsons, we need to request access to your photo library.

This will allow you to choose photos from your device to upload.

title: Notifications
content:
In Scuba SEAsons we have a number of social features  such as likes, comments and the ability to follow other divers’ activities.

To be notified when one of your submissions is accepted or when a user you are following makes a contribution, we ask that you please grant permission for notifications.

title: Thanks for joining Scuba SEAsons!
content:
That’s it!

You’re all setup.

If you ever want to change your diver name, you can do so from your profile page at any time.
